title: Stationery, "Set Shop", 1977
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description:
Letterhead (a) - In the upper left-hand corner, in a red and white color scheme, a partial S in stencil-style type, positioned within a segment of a circle, is surrounded by a segment of a curved border, imprinted Set Shop. The whole represents a partial view of the company's logo, which consists of a complete stencilled S imprinted in an inner circle, surrounded by Set Shop, imprinted on the perimeter of the outer circle. Just above the bottom edge, imprinted in bold sans-serif capitals, is Set Shop (black), followed by the address (gray) and telephone number (black).

Envelope (b) - Reduced versions of the letterhead's red and white design, in the lower right-hand corner; and of the business name and address, in the upper left-hand corner, comprise the design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Stationery, "Set Shop", 1977.
1977. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-153-a,b.
